name: HiveGrind
description:
Creator credits:

Ari Mabry (Areeee) - Music + Sound

Luca Stubbe (stubbelj) - Design + Programming

Arjun Krishnan (VIOLETS321) - Design + Programming

Janelle Mendoza (janmen) - Concept + Background

Levy Lu (leskylentils) - Concept + Character

Made in 7 days by this amazing team for the SGDA 2022 Summer Game Jam. Theme of the jam was "Game Over isn't the End". To see our artists' beautiful progress, you can download the pdf file below or visit: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1w6363YOHglslAB4kM3BmF0nq-fHJehks/view?usp=shari...
